trans-unit.source: Encapsulates basic validation rules that indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in either <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: 封装基本验证规则，指示是否一段自定义的数据被视为可个性化中任意一种<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>作用域。

trans-unit.source: A PersonalizationDictionary instance is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> objects, which consist of a personalization scope and an object value.
trans-unit.target: PersonalizationDictionary 实例是一个集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>组成个性化设置范围和对象值的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>

trans-unit.source: These entries are assigned a key in the PersonalizationDictionary object.
trans-unit.target: 这些项分配 PersonalizationDictionary 对象中的键。

trans-unit.source: A good practice is to add all properties to the dictionary using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A> method, regardless of the scope of the page.
trans-unit.target: 很好的做法是将所有属性都添加到字典使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A>方法，而不考虑页范围。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework saves the information in the appropriate way; for example, shared data is saved when the page is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 将信息保存在适当的方式;例如，共享的数据时，保存在页处于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: However, shared properties are not saved when a Web Parts value is being saved, the page is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control was added with the page in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 但是，共享的属性将不会保存在正在保存 Web 部件值，该页面的是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件已添加与中的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an empty dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化的空字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary will treat key values as case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 字典会将密钥值视为不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> class using the provided parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>类使用所提供的参数。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an empty dictionary based on the estimated number of entries to be stored in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化基于的估计要存储在字典中的条目数的空字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary will treat key values as case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 字典会将密钥值视为不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The estimated number of entries to be stored in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 估计要存储在字典中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: Adds personalization entries to the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 将个性化条目添加到个性化字典中。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method, place various pieces of custom state information into the state object, and specify the scope associated with the state value.
trans-unit.target: 可以调用此方法，将放置到状态对象的自定义状态信息的各组成部分，并指定状态的值与关联的范围。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope, you can add name and state information that is associated with either <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件处于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域，您可以添加使用关联的名称和状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope, you can add name and state information associated only with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域，您可以添加仅与关联的名称和状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: It is a good practice, however, to add all properties to the dictionary using <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A> including properties with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope, regardless of the scope of the page.
trans-unit.target: 不过，它是很好的做法，将所有属性添加到字典<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A>包括具有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域，而不考虑页范围。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework only saves the properties with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 仅将与属性保存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域在适当的时候。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: In other words, shared properties are not saved when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that was initially added in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope is later saved while the page is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，共享时，不会保存属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>中最初添加的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>页中时，更高版本保存范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In an opposite scenario, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control was added to the page in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope, and the control is later saved while the page is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope, custom shared property values are saved (along with custom user-scoped properties).
trans-unit.target: 在相反的方案中，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件已添加到中的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>页中时作用域和控件更高版本保存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>作用域，自定义的共享的属性值 （与自定义用户范围的属性） 一起保存。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For details on personalization data and how shared and user-scoped properties are affected by the personalization scope of the page, see the [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 个性化设置数据的详细信息和如何共享和用户范围的属性都受页上的个性化作用域，请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: As with any collection, this method increments the collection count by one and any enumerators currently active on the collection should be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 与任何集合，此方法递增集合计数&1;，并应失效，任何当前活动对集合的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for a piece of state information.
trans-unit.target: 一种状态信息的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: A piece of state information to be added to the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 一种状态信息添加到个性化字典。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all custom state information from the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除从当前的所有自定义状态信息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method clears all custom state information from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会清除从当前的所有自定义状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Any enumerators currently active against the collection should be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 任何当前活动对集合的枚举器应将失效。

trans-unit.source: To remove only a specific personalization entry in a personalization dictionary, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在个性化字典中删除仅特定个性化设置项，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that calling this method on an empty personalization dictionary does not raise an error.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在一个空的个性化设置字典上调用此方法时，不会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a piece of custom state information with the same key is contained in the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示个性化字典中包含一条使用相同密钥的自定义状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a piece of custom state information is contained in a personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以确定是否个性化字典中包含一条自定义状态信息。

trans-unit.source: A key value.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the provided key matches a key in the personalization dictionary; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果提供的密钥与个性化设置字典; 中的键相匹配否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: key is either an empty string (""), or trimming key results in an empty string.
trans-unit.target: key为空字符串 ("")，或修整key产生一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: Copies the personalization dictionary state entries as <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> instances into the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 将复制个性化字典状态项作为<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>到指定数组的实例。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an array of <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> instances from the state entries in the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建的数组<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>从个性化字典中状态条目的实例。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The array the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> instances are copied into.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>实例复制到。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 在此处开始将复制的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of entries in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取字典中的项数。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get the number of entries in the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来获取个性化字典中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 字典中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the entries in the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个枚举器可用于循环访问个性化字典中的条目。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information on enumerators, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> for the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>个性化字典。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the personalization dictionary is of a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否个性化字典，它具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` because personalization dictionaries are not of a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`因为个性化设置字典不是，它具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the personalization dictionary is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否个性化字典是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` because personalization dictionaries are not read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`因为个性化设置字典不是只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the personalization dictionary is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否已同步个性化字典。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` because personalization dictionaries are not synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`因为个性化设置字典不同步。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an entry in the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置个性化字典中的一个条目。

trans-unit.source: This property works with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> object representing custom personalization information that is identified by the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>对象，表示由标识的自定义的个性化信息`key`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>

trans-unit.source: If there is no value for `key`, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为值`key`，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: If `key` does not already exist, then `key` (and its associated value) are added to the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`尚不存在，然后`key`（和其关联的值） 添加到字典。

trans-unit.source: Note that you can add a null value to the dictionary, and the indexer can also be used to update the personalization value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，你可以将 null 值添加到字典中，还可以使用索引器来更新的个性化设置值。

trans-unit.source: The key of the entry to be retrieved or changed.
trans-unit.target: 要检索或更改的项的键。

trans-unit.source: A representing custom personalization information identified by the key parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 表示由标识的自定义的个性化信息 key 参数。

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: key is either an empty string (""), or trimming key results in an empty string.
trans-unit.target: key为空字符串 ("")，或修整key产生一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> object containing the keys for the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含个性化设置字典键的对象。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to obtain the keys for a personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以获取个性化字典的键。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the keys for the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含个性化字典的键。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes a custom state entry based on the provided key.
trans-unit.target: 删除基于提供的密钥的自定义状态条目。

trans-unit.source: Internally, when you remove a custom state entry, the count of the personalization dictionary is decremented by one.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，当删除自定义状态项时，将减少&1; 个性化字典中的计数。

trans-unit.source: Any enumerators currently active against the dictionary should be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 任何针对字典当前处于活动状态的枚举器应将失效。

trans-unit.source: No error occurs if you attempt to remove a nonexistent key.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试删除不存在的键，则会不发生任何错误。

trans-unit.source: The key of the entry to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的项的键。

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: key is either an empty string (""), or trimming key results in an empty string.
trans-unit.target: key为空字符串 ("")，或修整key产生一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对个性化字典的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 对于其基础存储区不公用的集合，预期的实现是返回当前实例。

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，指向当前实例的指针可能还不够对于包装了其他集合; 的集合这些集合应返回基础集合 SyncRoot 属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于同步对个性化字典的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.CopyTo%2A> method checks to determine whether `array` is an array of <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> items, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> class's own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.CopyTo%2A> method, passing to it `array` and `index`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.CopyTo%2A>方法进行检查以确定是否`array`是一个数组<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>项，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>类自己<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.CopyTo%2A>方法，并向它传递`array`和`index`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> items to copy into a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>的<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>项将复制到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The starting point in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> at which to insert `array`.
trans-unit.target: 中的起始点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>在其中插入`array`。

trans-unit.source: array is not an array of items.
trans-unit.target: array不是数组的项。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Add%2A> method checks several details to ensure the validity of `value` and `key` before attempting to add them to the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Add%2A>方法检查以确保的有效性的几个细节`value`和`key`然后再尝试将它们添加到个性化字典。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the checks are successful, the method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> class's own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Add%2A> method, passing to it the `key` and `value` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查均成功完成，该方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>类自己<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Add%2A>方法，并向它传递`key`和`value`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to use as the key for an item in the personalization dictionary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>用作个性化设置字典中的项键。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref> to add to the personalization dictionary.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Contains%2A>方法检查`key`以确保它是有效对象用于检查个性化字典中，并且如果是这样，它将其传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>类自己<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Contains%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Item%2A> first ensures that `key` is a <xref:System.String> object, and if so, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> class's own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Item%2A> property to return the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> whose key equals `key` in the current dictionary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Item%2A>首先确保`key`是<xref:System.String>对象，并且如果是，则调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>类自己<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Item%2A>属性以返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>其键等于`key`的当前字典中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary.Item%2A>
